headline: MarketAxess Brings In New CTO To Refresh AI And Trading Strategy
summary: MarketAxess Holdings (NasdaqGS:MKTX) has appointed William Quan as Chief Technology Officer. Quan will lead AI integration, technology modernization, and broader digital efforts at the company. The appointment follows leadership changes involving the outgoing Chief Information Officer. For context, MarketAxess shares most recently closed at $192.0, with the stock showing a 5.9% return over the past week and 13.9% over the past month.
